page.title: 16THE POST OFFICE
page.content: The postoffice is open six days a week with two half days closed, Monday and Thursday. The busiest time was Thursday morning because that is the day when most people have their pensions. Most of the business of the postoffice consisted of post. Mr. Hopkins told us that on average about three hundred people a week used the postoffice at Edwardsville and although because of the easy parking outside the postoffice, passing motorists made use of it, he did tend to see the same faces every day. Because the postoffice will close this month(July1985), we asked Mr. Hopkins what would happen to his customers. He seemed to think that although there will still be a post-box here, most of them would go to the postoffice at Treharris.Mr. Hopkins enjoys his job because it is busy. Lisa Jones11yrs.
